document.masterDocTitle: Bees of the genus Colletes Latreille 1802 of the Asian part of Russia, with keys to species (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Colletidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Bees of the genus Colletes Latreille 1802 of the Asian part of Russia, with keys to species (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Colletidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
C. kozlovi
Friese 1913
:
Figs 11 a
–b.
Colletes roborovskyi
species-group
C. roborovskyi
Friese 1913
:
Figs 11
c–d.
Colletes uralensis
species-group

C. pseudocinerascens
Noskiewicz 1936
:
Figs 16 a
–b. This species is very similar to
C. ulrikae
but S 7 is slightly longer with its apical part broader in relation to the median part and the punctures on T 1 are smaller and more regular in shape than in
C. ulrikae
.

C. ulrikae
Kuhlmann 2002
:
Figs 16
c–d; see
C. pseudocinerascens
.

C. chengtehensis
Yasumatsu 1935
:
Figs 18 a
–b. This species is very similar to
C. marginatus
but S 7 is apically narrower, punctation on T 1 is slightly finer and apical tergal hair bands are a bit broader than in
C. marginatus
.

C. marginatus
Smith 1846
:
Figs 18
c–d; see
C. chengtehensis
.
